channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Northbound light keeps getting stuck on red, 30th October
item.description:
Northbound light coming down the hill on Camberwell grove keeps getting stuck on red. This is causing issues with traffic backing up on the narrow part before the lights. 2 or 3 cycles have been going green on the other 2 lights before this one goes green. Issue has been present since at least Tuesday 28th october
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Camberwell Grove, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Local food trucks dumping commercial waste, 30th October
item.description:
Iâ€™m reporting repeated incidents of illegal commercial waste dumping by food trucks operating at 103 Union Street, London SE1 0LA. They have been regularly discarding meat waste, used oil cans, and other rubbish into the residential bins outside my property. We have had more rats, oil spills and rotten food smell from the waste that they are putting in the residential bins. This has caused overflowing bins, strong smells, and hygiene issues. As per the Environmental Protection Act 1990, commercial waste must not be disposed of in domestic bins, and this activity amounts to fly-tipping. I took these pictures this morning of the guys dumping rotten food from the restaurants into these bins and now they are all overflowing. I have pictures and videos to prove where they are coming from their license plate numbers for the van they bring up sometimes.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Quilp Street, The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet
